data.name: RTK13 - Mitsuteru Yokoyama's “Sangokushi” tie-up Officer CG “Zhuge Liang” 横山光輝「三国志」タイアップ武将CG「諸葛亮」
data.detailed_description:
Officer graphics based on the Zhuge Liang that appears in Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Zhuge Liang. The available face graphics will appear. Choose Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" Zhuge Liang Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.about_the_game:
Officer graphics based on the Zhuge Liang that appears in Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Zhuge Liang. The available face graphics will appear. Choose Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" Zhuge Liang Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
data.short_description: Officer graphics for the Zhuge Liang that appears in Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" will be added.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
